title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
oscars_won_details: Special Award (To Walt Disney for Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, recognized as a significant screen innovation which has charmed millions and pioneered a great new entertainment field)
description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

title: The Life of Emile Zola
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfus Affair.

title: Grand Illusion
description: During WWI, two French officers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp, where they form a bond with a sympathetic German officer.

title: The Awful Truth
description: A married couple, suspecting each other of infidelity, begins divorce proceedings but eventually realizes they are meant for each other.

title: Make Way for Tomorrow
description: An elderly couple are forced to separate when they lose their house and none of their five children will take them both in.

title: Lost Horizon
description: A plane crash delivers a group of people to the secluded land of Shangri-La, but is it a miracle or a prison?

title: A Star Is Born
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (W. Howard Greene for color photography)
description: A young woman comes to Hollywood with dreams of stardom, but achieves them only with the help of an alcoholic leading man whose days are numbered.

title: Captains Courageous
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A spoiled brat who falls off a steamship in the 1920s gets picked up by a fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep.

title: Stage Door
description: A boardinghouse for aspiring actresses houses a large number of young women with ambitions for the stage.

title: Dead End
description: The lives of the people living in a New York City slum are touched by a gangster seeking to escape his past and a young architect trying to escape his present.

title: Pépé le Moko
description: A gangster from Paris hides out in the Casbah of Algiers, where he is safe from the police but becomes trapped by his own exile.

title: A Day at the Races
description: A veterinarian posing as a doctor, a race horse owner and his friends struggle to help keep a sanitarium open with the help of a misfit race horse.

title: Way Out West
description: Stan and Ollie are entrusted with the deed to a gold mine to deliver to the daughter of a deceased prospector, but are duped by an evil saloon keeper.

title: Shall We Dance
description: A ballet dancer and a showgirl fake a marriage for publicity purposes, then fall in love.

title: The Prisoner of Zenda
description: An Englishman on a Ruritanian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch, a distant cousin, is drugged and kidnapped.

title: Stella Dallas
description: A working-class woman marries a wealthy socialite, but their class differences eventually tear them apart, leaving her to make a selfless sacrifice for her daughter's future.

title: Nothing Sacred
description: A woman diagnosed with radium poisoning becomes the toast of New York City, thanks to an ambitious newspaper reporter.

title: Topper
description: A fun-loving couple, finding themselves ghosts after a car wreck, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of a friend.

title: Easy Living
description: A rich financier throws his wife's fur coat out the window and it lands on a poor working girl, causing a series of misunderstandings.

title: The Good Earth
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A humble Chinese farmer and his wife face trials of flood, famine, and revolution in their struggle to survive.

title: In Old Chicago
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A fictionalized account of the Great Chicago Fire of 1871 and the O'Leary family's involvement in it.

title: The Hurricane
description: A native sailor on a South Seas island is unjustly imprisoned, escapes, and returns just as a devastating hurricane strikes.

title: One Hundred Men and a Girl
description: The daughter of an unemployed musician forms a symphony orchestra of unemployed musicians and tries to get Leopold Stokowski to conduct them.

title: Night Must Fall
description: A charming bellhop ingratiates himself into the household of a wealthy invalid, but her niece suspects he may be a murderer.

title: Conquest
description: The story of the romance between Napoleon Bonaparte and the Polish Countess Marie Walewska.

title: Marked Woman
description: A nightclub hostess risks her life to testify against the powerful gangster who employs her.

title: Kid Galahad
description: A boxing manager discovers a bellhop with a powerful punch and turns him into a contender, attracting the ire of a mobster.

title: Black Legion
description: A factory worker joins a secret hate group after being passed over for a promotion in favor of a foreign-born colleague.

title: Young and Innocent
description: A young woman helps a man on the run from the police prove his innocence of a murder charge.

title: History Is Made at Night
description: A woman wants a divorce from her jealous ship-owner husband but falls for a Parisian waiter instead.

title: Heidi
description: An orphan girl is sent to live with her grumpy grandfather in the Swiss Alps, where she transforms his life.

title: Wee Willie Winkie
description: A young girl traveling with her mother to India wins the hearts of the British regiment her grandfather commands.

title: The Prince and the Pauper
description: Two lookalike boys, one a poor beggar and the other a prince, switch places and experience each other's lives.

title: Saratoga
description: A bookie and the granddaughter of a horse breeder clash and fall in love on the racetrack circuit. Jean Harlow's final film.

title: Angel
description: The wife of a British diplomat travels to Paris and has a brief affair with a stranger, who turns out to be an old war friend of her husband.

title: It's Love I'm After
description: A bickering actor couple agree to help a young man whose fiancée has a crush on the actor.

title: True Confession
description: A pathological liar confesses to a murder she didn't commit to boost her husband's career as a lawyer, but things get complicated when she's acquitted.

title: Maytime
description: An elderly woman recounts her tragic past as a famous opera singer who chose career over love.

title: Oh, Mr. Porter!
description: A bumbling railway employee is sent to run a remote station in Ireland, where he encounters gun-runners and a ghost.

title: Humanity and Paper Balloons
description: A bleak but humanistic portrayal of life in an 18th-century Japanese slum, focusing on a ronin and a hairdresser.

title: Street Angel
description: A trumpet player and a singer living in the slums of Shanghai try to support each other amidst poverty and oppression.

title: Song at Midnight
description: A disfigured revolutionary hides in a theater and mentors a young opera singer, loosely based on Phantom of the Opera.

title: Elephant Boy
description: A young Indian boy claims he knows the location of a legendary herd of elephants.

title: King Solomon's Mines
description: Adventurer Allan Quartermain leads an expedition into uncharted African territory to find a missing explorer and the legendary diamond mines of King Solomon.

title: Ever Since Eve
description: A beautiful secretary disguises herself as plain to get a job where she won't be harassed, only to fall for her boss.

title: Green Light
description: A dedicated surgeon sacrifices his career to save the reputation of an older doctor who made a fatal mistake.

title: They Won't Forget
description: A Northern teacher in a Southern town is accused of murdering a student, and a politically ambitious prosecutor uses the case for his own ends.

title: Varsity Show
description: College students put on a show to save their university.

title: Waikiki Wedding
description: A PR man in Hawaii tries to convince a contest winner that the island is indeed romantic.

title: A Damsel in Distress
description: An American dancer in London falls for a noblewoman who is being kept in a castle by her family.

title: Slim
description: A farm boy becomes a high-tension wire lineman and competes with his mentor for the same girl.

title: The Edge of the World
description: A dramatized account of the depopulation of one of the isolated Shetland Islands.

title: Think Fast, Mr. Moto
description: The first of the Mr. Moto films, in which the Japanese detective stops a diamond smuggling ring.
